choices: You get up and look at your surroundings.
You call out for anyone for assistance.
You try to pull up your inventory with a hand gesture.
Wait a second, is this some kind of Hitchhikers Guide reference?
You prance around in place, seemingly losing your mind temporarily.
1.content: You wake up in a field. What do you do?
1.title: A new beginning

choices: You press the profile icon.
You press the bag icon.
Mystery button, go in for a pound!
Choose the Gear, that should be options
Push the bottom button.
13.content:
A gesture based UI appears, but all the text seems to be similar to Japanese.

There's 6 options, with a few icons.

1: A profile icon, you'd assume character or a similar option.

2: You see two swords crossed, but its greyed out, Maybe Skills or the like.

3: Icon of a bag, Inventory you presume.

4: The icon is unintelligible, and the text undecipherable. By process of elimination, the Social tab?

5: A gear icon, Options more than likely.

6: A door icon. Gotta be exit.
13.title: You try to pull up your inventory with a hand g...

choices: Panic
Don't Panic
14.content: Possibly, are you gonna follow the guide's basic orders?
14.title: Wait a second, is this some kind of Hitchhikers...

choices: Call out to the cackler, who might be a witch
Start running
141.content:
You scream aloud hoping for someone to pay attention.

After about 20 minutes of on and off screaming you hear something that sounds like a witch cackling.
141.title: Panic

choices: Look up the Entry as told
Random Guide Entry
SMASH THE MAGIC BOX FOR ITS SHINIES
142.content:
Good, Now have the Guide and look up Ziothea IV.

A black metal book drops from the sky into your hands. It has the words "Don't Panic" on the cover.
142.title: Don't Panic

choices: Look up the related Entry about the fungus.
Put the Guide on the ground and head towards the tower.
1421.content:
The book chirps to life.

"Ziothea IV: A planet with a rampant fungus with an odd memetic property, for more info, check the related entry. People with too much free time visit for a once in a lifetime experience then travel all the way across the galaxy to get it fixed because you can just casually do that when...."

(The rest of the article rambles about various concepts that start to bore you as you read them.)

Over the edge of the Guide you see a tower of sorts at about a day's travel, as you best guess. Well, an Earth day's travel.
1421.title: Look up the Entry as told

choices: BACK ITCH GONNA SCRATCH
Alright I'm sorry for smashing the guide, just get this shit off my arm.
1423.content:
Wait what are you OH NO DON'T SMASH THE GUIDE.

You smash the guide for the shiny parts you assume are inside, but unfortunately this causes a weird goolike substance to coat your hands as you beat the guide against a loose rock. The goo refuses to come off, so guess you have some new fashionable gloves, even if the goo is chirping.

Any other priceless technology you want to destroy, you neanderthal?
1423.title: SMASH THE MAGIC BOX FOR ITS SHINIES

info.brief_description: A generic enough CYOA story with TG elements.
info.description:
Hi there, I couldn't find a better name for this, so its New Day.

It's a Choose Your Own adventure I will port partially from my comment based DA account, then leave for others to complete and maybe write a passage on occasionally.

Rules:
18+ characters (if a character is under-aged in canon, it will be their adult version)
Keep it clean enough for writing.com, I don't want to have to moderate this all the time or reupload the entire thing again.

Ahem, lets start at the beginning...
